101.title: Value for money
101.description: I like the product very much. It is very useful and a must buy product. I will recommend to everyone to go for this.

102.title: Nice finishing
102.description: I have kept this in my hall it gives a wonderful look to my room and also I can clean it smoothly because the finishing of the product is too good.

103.title: Impressed with the product
103.description: Cushion quality is good, fabric & color is also good. Exactly same as shown in picture. Recommended.
